ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] New messages
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If there were such a thing it should be like Automatic vs. Standard shifting though, it auto-weaves  but at a performance penalty, say 2 songs auto-woven,
ygData.messageBody:
>i'm lucky to get 2 on dragons and planes, but that just brings us back to
>another point. there really should be some type of skill for bards in
>expansion to relieve some of our twisting woes don't you think? doubtful i
>know but after 110+ days played as a bard, i simply can not stand twisting
>anymore =)


If there were such a thing it should be like Automatic vs. Standard shifting
though, it auto-weaves but at a performance penalty, say 2 songs
auto-woven, or if you don't use it as many as you can pull off. :o)

Tszaaz E'Taurguin
